content: if you re looking for a simple classic hat pattern then look no further than the blank slate hat this quick chunky hat is knit on straight needles and seamed together with mattress stitch if you can knit purl and cast on then you re ready to knit the blank slate hat the hat is knit with just one ball of rico design essentials super super chunky in color 32 grab the free pattern & video tutorial https //sheepandstitch com/pattern/how-to-knit-a-hat-on-straight-needles-tutorial/ this pattern comes with an in-depth video tutorial that guides you through the whole knitting process the video tutorial includes three easy ideas for jazzing up the hat so that it s no longer a blank slate but an expression your unique personality
